<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_4"></A>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE BGCOLOR="WHITE" CELLPADDING="4" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="50%">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Mobile Capture Innovation
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	TIS is a pioneer in the delivery of innovative mobile capture technology. Our solutions are now deployed within the banking sector by leading financial service providers such as Fiserv and Jack Henry and Associates.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	In 2012 TIS released the mobiFLOW mobile imaging platform as a stand-alone SDK that enables our partners to leverage TIS mobile technology to embed mobile applications that span across mobile check deposit, mobile bill payment and mobile enrollment solutions.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="50%" BGCOLOR="SILVER" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 2PX SOLID; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 2PX SOLID; BORDER-TOP: BLACK 2PX SOLID; BORDER-RIGHT: BLACK 2PX SOLID">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	TIS signed a contract with Fiserv to supply them with our mobile imaging platform for a range of applications that can be integrated with existing Fiserv solutions deployed today at billers and financial institutions across the U.S. Initially Fiserv developed its Snap-to-Pay mobile bill payment application on the mobiFLOW platform as an add-on functionality for select Fiserv mobile banking and payments solutions that enables end-consumers to pay bills quickly and easily with a snap of their smartphone camera.&#160;&#160;The launch of Snap-to-Pay by Fiserv is well-positioned in the market, as Fiserv manages the largest electronic bill payment network in the U.S., facilitating bill payments through thousands of billers and financial institutions for millions of end consumers.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Ginger Schmeltzer, Senior Vice President, Emerging Payments, Fiserv at the time of the agreement commented &#8220;Fiserv is committed to offering its customers a robust, dependable mobile imaging platform and applications that will ensure optimal quality, operational efficiency and a positive user experience.&#160;&#160;We are confident that this agreement with TIS will continue to position us to meet growing consumer, biller and financial institution demand for these services.&#8221; In another publication Ms. Schmeltzer remarked, &#8220;The launch of Snap-to-Pay reflects the ongoing evolution of the Fiserv payments vision.&#160;&#160;It&#8217;s important that we make the end user mobile payment experience easy and friction-free in order to drive adoption... Snap-to-Pay is a timesaver, and that is a valuable convenience for people who want to pay a bill and get on with their day.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="4" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="80%" BGCOLOR="SILVER" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 2PX SOLID; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 2PX SOLID; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; BORDER-TOP: BLACK 2PX SOLID; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; BORDER-RIGHT: BLACK 2PX SOLID">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Xerox Brazil partnered with TIS to provide a mobiENROLL digital enrollment solution for a leading Brazilian telecom provider which was deployed at 3000 retail stores across Brazil. Top Image Systems was chosen to provide a mobile enrollment app that would efficiently integrate with Xerox&#8217;s back office document management solution. &#8220;We at Xerox Brazil are extremely enthusiastic about the enormous business potential of this partnership. There are endless opportunities across the Brazilian market to leverage mobile image processing to accelerate and increase the efficiency and accuracy of document-based processes...and to generate substantial new business.&#8221; Marcus Vinicius Lopes, Global Document Outsourcing, Xerox Brazil.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The mobiFLOW SDK is a multi-purpose mobile capture and processing platform that enables capture of any document of any size using a mobile device.&#160;&#160;&#160;Our patent-pending APMI (Automatic Perfect Mobile Image) technology and embedded quality verification functionalities ensure that our applications provide the best user experience available.&#160;&#160;The &#8220;APMI&#8221; technology delivers easy-to-use &#8220;auto-capture&#8221; functionality. APMI guides the user to hover with the smartphone above a document; in the split second that the APMI technology identifies that conditions are sufficient to take the picture (based on lighting, angle, distance, stability and other parameters) it automatically takes the picture. The APMI-based application also helps the user by hinting how the handset should be held (e.g. - closer, turn right, tilt down) in order to improve image quality. Consequently, the user avoids time-consuming repetitive image creation, examination, enhancement and rejection and enables high-quality capture on the first attempt.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PGBRK" STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID="FTR">
<DIV ID="GLFTR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">

	- 20 -
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Strategic Acquisitions extend market reach to cloud based document process automation
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	With the acquisition of eGistics Inc., a leading U.S.-based provider of cloud solutions for financial service providers and banks, in 2014, TIS added the eGistics cloudDocs&#174; platform to our product offering.&#160;&#160;&#160;The acquisition enabled the company to extend its footprint into the U.S. banking sector for remittance processing.&#160;&#160;The company has relationships with the largest financial service providers such as First Data and with the top banks in the U.S.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="4" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="60%" BGCOLOR="SILVER" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 2PX SOLID; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 2PX SOLID; BORDER-TOP: BLACK 2PX SOLID; BORDER-RIGHT: BLACK 2PX SOLID">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Bank of the West added the Snap-to-Pay application to their mobile banking program under the name Scan to Pay.&#160;&#160;&#160;Through extensive testing, Bank of the West found Scan to Pay to be the most accurate service of its kind with almost no image rejections - &#8211; ~78% recognition; 77% field level accuracy; 35% perfect reads. Scan to Pay stands out through its use of machine learning to read mobile images of bill stubs, creating a streamlined, easy and efficient process for users. &#8220;We wanted to build something that is easy to use that gets it right virtually every time," said Jamie Armistead, executive vice president and head of digital channels at Bank of the West.&#160;&#160;Later bank analyses of the product were positive, showing that bill set up with the app takes less than 30 seconds with accuracy rates more than 30% higher than current industry benchmarks. Scan-to-Pay was the first Bill Pay experience for 30% of the users, meaning new business for the bank; new users capture twice more bills than established users as they have many more payees to add; overall mobile bill pay volume grew 14%.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The first mobiCHECK implementation at a leading global bank based in the UK with deployment of over 1 million users was deployed by TIS partner Jack Henry &amp; Associates, Inc. &#8220;We have been impressed by the technologies underlying the TIS mobile capture solution and believe the combined strength of the TIS solution and our Alogent Mobile Remote Deposit solution will accommodate our international expansion strategy.&#8221; Stacey Zengel, GM Imaging Solutions, Jack Henry &amp; Associates, Inc. In 2015 Stacey Zengel was promoted to President of the Jack Henry
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Banking division.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_5"></A>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_6"></A>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE BGCOLOR="WHITE" CELLPADDING="4" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="50%">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The eGistics acquisition enabled us to expand our solution suite to provide cloud-based document management and archiving applications to the U. S&#8217;s top financial institutions and 3rd party processors such as PNC Bank, First Data and FIS.&#160;&#160;This highly scalable and highly secure cloud-based solution for the long-term storage and management of remittance (payment) images and data enables remittance corporate customers to correct and make exception decisions on-line to speed up posting.&#160;&#160;We provide an agile, highly secure solution for the short- or long-term storage of ACH payment information and attached documents, and streamline dispute research and management. We provide secure, compliant cloud-based document management for banks - a solution that enables a bank to capture, store, protect and manage its own important business documents with over 50 billion documents managed and archived in a highly secure (PCI certified, and AT 101 SOC 2 Type 2, FFIEC and HIPAA compliant) private cloud data center.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="50%" BGCOLOR="SILVER" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 2PX SOLID; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 2PX SOLID; BORDER-TOP: BLACK 2PX SOLID; BORDER-RIGHT: BLACK 2PX SOLID">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	FLOW Remit has been deployed by the top five and many other leading U.S. banks and financial institutions. One such customers is global payment processing company First Data Corporation. Operating 8 data centers across the U.S. each collecting millions of images per month, FDC had to aggregate all the images into a single archive and make the images available to users via a variety of front-end systems. FDC needed to replace legacy archive system with image platform to access payment-related data on which could build revenue-generating services, including decisioning.&#160;&#160;Upon deploying eFLOW Remit, First Data achieved reduced paper storage and management costs; integrated images from disparate capture sources into a central archive; enhanced risk management; improved customer service; ensured regulatory compliance and centralized administrative control. They also generated revenue from the eFLOW Remit Decisioning Module.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_7"></A>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE BGCOLOR="WHITE" CELLPADDING="4" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="50%" BGCOLOR="SILVER" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 2PX SOLID; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 2PX SOLID; BORDER-TOP: BLACK 2PX SOLID; BORDER-RIGHT: BLACK 2PX SOLID">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	In 2015, BNY Mellon, a global leader in investment management and investment services, upgraded its receivables solutions; as part of this upgrade, BNY Mellon initiated deployment of eFLOW Remit to power delivery of enhanced archival, retrieval and reporting services to BNY Mellon&#8217;s receivables clients.&#160;&#160;"Our receivables services are an important part of our supply chain solutions," said Paul Simons, managing director and head of the Supply Chain Product Management Group for BNY Mellon's Treasury Services business.&#160;&#160;&#8220;One of the key benefits we can deliver to clients is our ability to consolidate payment flows and remittance information across the full array of payment channels, electronic as well as paper-based. Our collaboration with TIS adds new and exciting dimensions to our ability to provide insights and analytics on receivables quickly, efficiently and on a fully integrated basis.&#160;&#160;It's another example of strategic commitment to excellence as a provider of supply chain services."
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="50%">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Looking forward, TIS envisions fully leveraging our advanced cloud and mobile capture technologies to merge the eFLOW and CloudDocs solution sets to create a set of future-forward banking process automation solutions that engage bank customers as fully empowered participants in their banking processes.&#160;&#160;Customers and bankers will be able to augment their familiar current bank-based processes with the ability to conveniently capture documents using a mobile or desktop device anytime, anywhere, inside or outside the bank branch and deliver them via a fully-integrated document processing platform without jeopardizing banking systems&#8217; security or compliance, truly transforming digital banking via full customer engagement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>

<A NAME="eolPage26"></A>
<DIV ID="HDR">
<DIV ID="GLHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	In addition, TIS offers CloudDocs for Healthcare, a highly scalable claims management system that enables users to quickly search millions of documents directly from the CloudDocs user interface. CloudDocs for Healthcare helps health care or health care-related organizations handle an increasing number of documents, forms and records that must be captured, organized, protected and retrieved at a moment's notice.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Rebranded as eFLOW CloudDocs, this cloud-based platform also extends our market reach to support highly scalable and secure cloud based document process automation and archival solutions.&#160;&#160;It forms and important foundation for our next generation of cloud based financial process automation solutions&#160;&#160;&#160;The eFLOW CloudDocs platform automates the capture, management and storage of documents for any business process in a highly secure, highly scalable and compliant environment in the cloud.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	eFLOW CloudDocs DM&#8217;s multi-tenant, SaaS-based architecture also enables access and retrieval of stored documents from any authorized device, anywhere. The intuitive interface of CloudDocs DM enables users to build the site to reflect their own organizational structure. Documents can be organized by department, function, location, role, or according to other user defined parameters.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	The Way Forward:&#160;&#160;End-to-end Financial Process Automation (FPA) Solution.
</FONT>
<BR>
</DIV>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_8"></A>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE BGCOLOR="WHITE" CELLPADDING="4" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="50%" STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	TIS has made significant efforts to deliver an end-to-end financial process automation solution that automate processes such as Procure-to-Pay and Order-to-Cash.&#160;&#160;Our solutions enable treasury and finance organizations to streamline their labor-intensive and error-prone processes to reduce transaction costs, reduce invoice processing cycle times and thereby empower treasury to take advantage of early payment discounts to realize higher returns on invested capital.&#160;&#160;We enable our customers to capture supplier invoices from multiple channels, automate the extraction, validation and matching of invoice metadata and line item information and integrate with back end ERP applications for approval and payment.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="50%" BGCOLOR="SILVER" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 2PX SOLID; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 2PX SOLID; BORDER-TOP: BLACK 2PX SOLID; BORDER-RIGHT: BLACK 2PX SOLID">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	CNH America, LLC, a subsidiary of Fiat Industrial S.p.A, manufactures agricultural and construction equipment, employing some 30,000 and operating a network of 11,300 dealers worldwide. At CNH eFLOW processes some 53,000 invoices per month, including 11,000 EDI items, with 70% field recognition before initiation of system tuning.&#160;&#160;Over 70% of matching invoices are touched only once in eFLOW and posted directly to SAP and 75% of invoices are posted automatically.&#160;&#160;The system executes EDI visualization functionality to identify erroneous EDI items early on.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_10"></A>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE BGCOLOR="WHITE" CELLPADDING="4" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="50%" BGCOLOR="SILVER" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 2PX SOLID; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 2PX SOLID; BORDER-TOP: BLACK 2PX SOLID; BORDER-RIGHT: BLACK 2PX SOLID">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	User Advice: Consider AP invoice automation solutions to augment your ERP payable processes when most of your purchasing activities are non-PO-related, are processed outside your ERP system, or if casual users find the user interface of the ERP system too complex. If you have multiple ERP solutions and/or multiple instances of a single ERP, AP invoice automation solutions can be leveraged to provide a common interface to AP to support a single financial management process for AP. Evaluate offerings from your strategic ERP vendor against specialist solutions from APIA, P2P and TEM vendors.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Source: Gartner Research &#8220;IT Market Clock for Financial Management Applications, 2015&#8221;, Published: 30 September 2015, Nigel Rayner, Christopher Iervolino, John E. Van Decker.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="50%">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The company places strategic focus on the emerging FPA market opportunity within the mid-market segment.&#160;&#160;We are developing financial process automation solutions that can be deployed on premises, in hybrid and in cloud environments and which combine cloud capture, workflow and a gateway to multiple back-end enterprise resource planning or ERP platforms.&#160;&#160;In particular, the cloud ERP adoption trend is accelerating within the mid-market, with 60% of companies in the $25 million to $1 billion range expected to adopt cloud ERP platforms over the next 3-5 years. We are enhancing and expanding our Financial Process Automation solutions to meet this growing demand and it represents our strategic focus for creating accelerated revenue growth.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_11"></A>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE BGCOLOR="WHITE" CELLPADDING="4" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="50%">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	TIS&#8217; eFLOW for Accounts Payable solution sets a new standard for financial processing by offering users the option of a traditional on premise deployment, a completely cloud-based deployment, or a hybrid deployment.&#160;&#160;Tailored for mid-market companies where the migration of ERP to the cloud can be extremely challenging, the eFLOW AP solution offers a simple and flexible deployment path.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	eFLOW&#160;&#160;&#160;provides an end-to-end solution for multichannel invoice capture and workflow that collects invoices of any type, extracts the relevant invoice data and validates it with three-way matching against the ERP, enabling seamless straight through process automation.&#160;&#160;Fully integrated with SAP and other ERP systems our solution enables efficient payment, improves Accounts Payable monitoring and cash flow planning.&#160;&#160;Maximized straight-through processing and compressed invoice processing cycles, eliminating delays and penalties and achieving discounts, mean significantly reduced invoice processing costs.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="50%" BGCOLOR="SILVER" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 2PX SOLID; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 2PX SOLID; BORDER-TOP: BLACK 2PX SOLID; BORDER-RIGHT: BLACK 2PX SOLID">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Throughout TIS&#8217;s history we have deployed complex Accounts Payable automation solutions at leading enterprises worldwide.&#160;&#160;&#160;Bosch Service Solutions, an international supplier of Shared Services and Business Process Outsourcing and a part of the Bosch Group, one of the world&#8217;s leading global supplier of technology and services, has deployed eFLOW to process its over 300,000 invoices per month, arriving in German, English, Chinese (Fapiao invoices) &amp; other languages.&#160;&#160;eFLOW processes some 160 distinct company codes, each with specific requirements.&#160;&#160;&#160;The system automatically recognizes the invoice data with a field recognition rate of over 80%, achieving straight through processing rates of up to 40% and posts the invoices in SAP.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The first release of our newest FPA release eFLOW AP, launched in the first quarter of 2016, targets SAP users&#160;&#160;&#160;The seamless integration of the eFLOW AP automation solution with SAP extends the value of customers&#8217; ERP investments by delivering greater workflow flexibility, streamlined exception resolution and enhanced visibility into AP data, all within SAP. The SAP deployment option offers several important advantages, including:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.049PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE BGCOLOR="WHITE" CELLPADDING="4" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="50%">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	In addition, the solution also leverages the most up-to-date SAP functionality such as FIORI resulting in a simplified user experience that enables users to work within a single consistent environment which distinguishes our solution from many competing alternatives. Our solution enables familiar interfaces for professional SAP users, easy data retrieval and validation from relevant SAP modules, easy use of existing SAP structures for authority checks and approval hierarchies, overall increasing return on investment in the existing SAP implementation.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="50%" BGCOLOR="SILVER" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 2PX SOLID; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 2PX SOLID; BORDER-TOP: BLACK 2PX SOLID; BORDER-RIGHT: BLACK 2PX SOLID">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Accounts Payable operations of the global power generation provider ENEL involves 17 subsidiaries, 7000 suppliers and agents, creating 7-8 million invoices per year across multiple SAP systems &amp; versions (4.6c, 4.7 e ECC 6.0).&#160;&#160;An internal review in 2013 indicated that the project within which eFLOW is implemented achieved ROI of 385% resulting in an NPV of &#8364;14m.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</DIV>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	eFLOW AP includes the following main components:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">

	&#183;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	eFLOW Extract: Advanced extraction, validation and matching of data from invoices and other payables documents that arrive in any format, from any source, including from mobile devices.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">

	eFLOW Control: Streamlined invoice review, automated posting, automated data completion and invoice validation including OCR on the fly capabilities.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">

</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>

<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">

</FONT>

<DIV>

<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	eFLOW Archive: Highly secure cloud-based archive that provides instant access to images and related data, workflow logs and robust reporting and analytics from anywhere, at any time.&#160;&#160;eFLOW AP leverages the eFLOW CloudDocs archival platform for highest data security, letting users quickly organize documents by category, function, department or responsibility and share and archive invoices, purchase orders and related documents.&#160;&#160;The solution also provides real-time reports that identify process bottlenecks and monitor performance, empowering finance departments to continuously improve and streamline accounts payable operations.
</FONT>
</DIV>

	- 23 -
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">
<HR STYLE="COLOR: BLACK" NOSHADE SIZE="3">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage28"></A>
<DIV ID="HDR">
<DIV ID="GLHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Order to Cash
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Financial Process Automation (FPA) solutions can automate all stages of the payment cycle.&#160;&#160;On the accounts receivables side, TIS accelerates overall accounts receivable processes through expedited capture of AR documents from purchase orders through to remittance advices. In 2015, TIS expanded its activities in this sphere through partnership with a leading financial supply chain management processing provider, cooperating to offer automated remittance advice management solutions.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	eFLOW for Sales and Purchase Orders
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	eFLOW for Sales and Purchase Orders makes sales order processing simple and consistent, streamlining document management workflow processing with sales and purchase order automation. eFLOW automates processing of all types of sales and purchase orders&#8212;any structure, any method of delivery.&#160;&#160;The arrival of a purchase order&#8212;whether by fax, mail or email&#8212;prompts eFLOW to automatically capture and extract the relevant data. The solution classifies and verifies the extracted data, then feeds it directly into the ERP system for further action. Error-free PO data is shared across business systems, improving processes and communications.&#160;&#160;The solution also contributes to regulatory compliance by facilitating the maintenance of internal controls, transparency and clear accountability.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Initiating downstream processes automatically upon receipt of every purchase or sales order eliminates lag time. Reducing response times and assuring high accuracy of data improves customer service levels, eliminates painful and costly customer complaints and the need for error correction and complaint management, ultimately bringing higher order replacement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Principal Markets
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	As of December 31, 2015, we operated offices and branches in Israel, the United States, the United Kingdom, Germany, Hong Kong, Singapore, Australia and Japan.&#160;&#160;Our U.S. branch is responsible for sales, marketing and support activities in the United States, Canada, and Latin America.&#160;&#160;In addition, we believe that significant opportunities exist elsewhere in Europe, in Asia and in Africa.&#160;&#160;We have several local sales and technical representatives in multiple countries. These representatives manage our sales, marketing and operational activity in their locations, providing integration and implementation services, as well as marketing support.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The following table summarizes total revenues by category of activity and geographic market for each of the last three completed fiscal years:
</FONT>
</DIV>

<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%" STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#160;

	%
</FONT>
</TD>

</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Seasonality
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Seasonality does not currently affect our business in a material manner because the seasonality of different markets substantially offset each other.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Our business significantly depends upon the requirements of large corporations and governmental agencies.&#160;&#160;As many of these entities operate according to annual budgets, their tendency is to approve budgets in the beginning of the fiscal year and release the budgets toward the end of the fiscal year. This mode of operation affects our results of operations throughout the year.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Marketing Channels
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	TIS continues to expand its credibility, brand recognition and presence worldwide through its channel sales program and investment in technology partnerships.&#160;&#160;TIS cooperates with over 70 partners worldwide, including Xerox, PFU (Fujitsu) Imaging Solutions, Tata Consulting Services, Cognizant, Amdocs, Hanse Orga, Kodak and many others. We work with numerous eFLOW&#174; resellers worldwide as well as with leading BPOs in North America and Europe.&#160;&#160; We maintain technology partnerships with the world&#8217;s leading software vendors and with a broad set of recognition engine providers as well as with BPM and specialty workflow providers.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PGBRK" STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID="FTR">
<DIV ID="GLFTR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PN" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; WIDTH: 100%">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	- 25 -
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">
<HR STYLE="COLOR: BLACK" NOSHADE SIZE="3">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage30"></A>
<DIV ID="HDR">
<DIV ID="GLHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The data capture market has been most recently characterized by consolidation. Lexmark, after acquiring Brainware and its Perceptive Software solution proceeded to ReadSoft and Kofax.&#160;&#160;As a result, we are one of the few remaining independent global software companies in the document automation space.&#160;&#160;We believe that we are positioned to benefit from present market dynamics by establishing partnerships with companies seeking to replace their capture and workflow vendor.&#160;&#160;&#160;These opportunities may increase the length and complexity of our sales cycle.&#160;&#160;However, they position us to enter into partnerships potentially leading to a larger pool of sizable deals that enable us to team with companies possessing complementary skills and functionalities.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	In parallel, TIS is actively strengthening its joint go-to-market strategy with Xerox, Workflow Automation and other strategic partners in order to sell comprehensive end-to-end solutions based on eFLOW Digital Mailroom and/or eFLOW AP. We are also leveraging our eFLOW platform together with partner software and services to better meet customer demand and to expand our sales capacity.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Partnerships are also key in the area of mobile imaging, where our strategy is to accelerate our presence primarily through developing partnerships for sales.&#160;&#160;TIS has signed agreements with well-known suppliers to the US financial industry such as Jack Henry &amp; Associates and Fiserv, one of the leading global solution providers to banks and other financial institutions.&#160;&#160;TIS is developing a broad network of mobile imaging partners to maximize its market access to this large, dynamic and fast growing sector.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Competition
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Competition in the multichannel capture, workflow and delivery market is intensifying.&#160;&#160;While there is much consolidation at the high end of the market, overall the market is fragmented and is characterized by numerous local applications, varying requirements, a multitude of specific vertical solutions and various combined software offerings to customers. Competitors usually focus on one or more key business processes and their solutions address differing needs, which vary according to company size, industry, geography and platform. Within the ECM lifecycle, TIS focuses primarily on the imaging and capture phase along with integrated, embedded BPM workflow capabilities. The big three ECM players (IBM, Opentext, and Oracle) primarily focus on the stages that follow capture, meaning BPM, content storage (archiving) and records management.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	In contrast to solutions offered by smaller players, we built our eFLOW&#174; platform from the ground up. The platform accordingly covers the entire spectrum of capture and imaging functionality, in contrast with many competitor solutions that focus only on specific areas (such as Accounts Payable). The data capture/imaging market is highly fragmented with more than 50 players and has recently been in a consolidation trend. We compete with Lexmark and its subsidiary Perceptive Software, IBM (which acquired Datacap), Oracle, Banctec, Basware, Hyland (which acquired AnyDoc), eCopy, Global360 (acquired by OpenText), Ikon, Itesoft, Nuance, Parascript, Scansoft, Scan Optics, as well as a variety of manual data entry systems.&#160;&#160;Newer entries capturing interest and market share include Esker, Ephesoft, Coupa and Concur in the AP space.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	In the United States and Europe, we often compete with multiple industry participation supplying similar solutions. In the Asia Pacific region, we compete mainly with local technology providers and the large global competitors. TIS competes in global and regional tenders as well as in the open market.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	In the area of mobile capture and payments, we compete primarily with Mitek Systems, Inc., which was the first to market in the U.S. and has considerable market share.&#160;&#160;Lexmark, which acquired Kofax, also offers a mobile capture solution. We view increased competition as a positive development through its effectively educating the market and increasing industry confidence in mobile solutions in general.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	In the remittance processing arena, our solutions compete mostly with the solutions of Wausau (recently acquired by Deluxe) as well as with in-house solutions.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PGBRK" STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID="FTR">
<DIV ID="GLFTR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PN" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; WIDTH: 100%">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	- 26 -
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">
<HR STYLE="COLOR: BLACK" NOSHADE SIZE="3">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage31"></A>
<DIV ID="HDR">
<DIV ID="GLHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Third Party Technology
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	We license various recognition software technologies from third parties in order to utilize them in our products. We currently use technologies developed by several different companies. Depending upon the requirements of each customer, we incorporate one or several of such technologies into a specific product. We are not dependent upon any single source of recognition software technology and the various technologies that we use are, in large part, interchangeable.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Intellectual Property Rights
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Our success depends upon our proprietary software technology. We rely on trade secret protection, employee and third-party nondisclosure agreements and other intellectual property protection methods to protect our confidential and proprietary information. In addition, we are engaged in efforts to protecting our intellectual property through the filing of patent applications. Despite these efforts, we cannot be certain that others will not otherwise gain access to our trade secrets or copy and use information that we regard as proprietary without our authorization. None of our patent applications have yet resulted in a patent and we cannot assure you that we will succeed in obtaining any patents. We can disclose that on March 2, 2016 our application to issue US patent application number 14/078,637 which was filed on 13, November 2013 has been allowed for issuance. Notwithstanding, we cannot assure you that:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
	&#183;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	any patents which we may obtain will be broad enough to protect our technology, will provide us with competitive advantages or will escape challenge or invalidation by third parties;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
	&#183;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	the patents of others will not have an adverse effect on our ability to do business; or
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
	&#183;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	others will not independently develop similar products, duplicate our products or, if patents are issued to us, design around these patents.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Further, the laws of foreign jurisdictions where we sell and seek to sell our products may afford little or no protection of our intellectual property rights. We cannot assure you that the protection provided to our intellectual property rights by the laws and courts of foreign nations will be substantially similar to the remedies available under U.S. law.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	We believe that our technology has been developed independently and does not infringe on the proprietary rights of others. However, we cannot assure you that the technology does not and will not infringe or that third parties will not assert infringement claims against us in the future. In the case of infringement, we would, under certain circumstances, be required to modify our products or obtain a license. We cannot assure you that we would be able to do either in a timely manner under acceptable terms and conditions or at all, or that we will have the financial or other resources necessary to defend successfully a patent infringement or other proprietary rights infringement action. Further, even if we were not infringing, intellectual property litigation is expensive and time consuming for management. Failure to do any of the foregoing could have a material adverse effect on us.&#160;&#160;Furthermore, if our products or technologies are deemed to infringe upon the rights of others, we could become liable for damages, which could have a material adverse effect on us.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	In addition, we license components of our software systems and technology from third parties in reliance on such parties&#8217; representations as to ownership of the licensed intellectual property. If our licensors are found not to own or have rights to sublicense such rights to us and we are unable to replace the licensed technology with a comparable substitute, there could be a material adverse effect on our business prospects and financial results. Even if we were to replace licensed technology with available alternatives, it could take time to identify the best replacement and integrate it into our software. The delay and uncertainty could negatively impact our financial results.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	We believe that product recognition is an important competitive factor in the form processing industry. Accordingly, we promote the
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	eFLOW
</FONT>
	&#174; name in connection with our marketing activities.&#160;On March 10, 2009, the United States Patent and Trade Office (the &#8220;USPTO") registered a trademark for one of our significant solution and module names, namely
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	eFLOW
</FONT>
	&#174;, for computer software applications; namely, software applications that processes and integrates data provided from various sources across a single platform, in Class 9 (U.S. CLS. 21, 23, 26, 36 and 38).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PGBRK" STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID="FTR">
<DIV ID="GLFTR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PN" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; WIDTH: 100%">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	- 27 -
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">
<HR STYLE="COLOR: BLACK" NOSHADE SIZE="3">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage32"></A>
<DIV ID="HDR">
<DIV ID="GLHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Likewise, on May 26, 2009, the USPTO registered our trademark TIS&#174; for use in connection with &#8220;Application service provider (ASP) featuring software, technical consultation and technical assistance in the field of computer systems and installation, maintenance, and updating of computer software&#8221; in International Class 042 (U.S. CLS. 100 and 101).&#160;Similarly, on May 26, 2009, the USPTO registered our trademark TOP IMAGE SYSTEMS&#174; for use in connection with &#8220;Technical consultation in the field of computer systems; technical assistance in the nature of technical support services, namely, troubleshooting of computer hardware and software systems; installation, maintenance and updating of computer software&#8221;, in International Class 042 (U.S. CLS. 100 and 101).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Warranty and Service
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	We generally negotiate our warranty obligations with respect to our products on a case-by-case basis.&#160;&#160;Normally our warranty period is up to three months. We may be exposed to potential product liability claims by our customers and users of our products. Currently, we hold worldwide product liability insurance and professional indemnity policies that provide coverage limited to different amounts up to $9 million. Despite this coverage, a successful claim against us for product liability could have a material adverse effect on our financial condition.&#160;&#160;While we have not experienced material warranty liability in the past, we cannot assure you that future warranty expense will not have an adverse effect on us.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	We have various maintenance and support agreements with many of our customers. These agreements typically provide us with regular payments of fees ranging 15-25% per annum of the applicable license fees. Our technical team also provides support to value-added resellers, distributors and systems integrators to assist in the integration of our products.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Governmental Regulation
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The government of Israel encourages research and development projects through the OCS pursuant to the Law for the Encouragement of Industrial Research and Development, 1984 (the &#8220;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Research Law
</FONT>
	&#8221;). In several times before, we received grants from the government of Israel through the OCS to finance portion of our research and development expenditures in Israel. Such grants bear royalties on sales of products utilizing technologies developed using such grants or arising out of such technologies, up to a maximum of 100% of the amount of participation received, linked to the dollar plus interest at the LIBOR rate for 12 month loans on the first day of trading in the year during which the grant was approved. In addition, if we fail to comply with any of the conditions imposed by the OCS, including the payment of royalties with respect to grants received, we may be required to refund any payments previously received from the OCS, together with interest and penalties. In 2015 we did not receive any grants. By way of comparison, in 2012, 2013 and 2014 together, we received grants totaling $408,000
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The terms of the OCS grants limit our ability to transfer technologies outside of Israel without the prior approval of the OCS, if such technologies were developed using OCS grants or arose out of such technologies.&#160;&#160;The OCS has the right but not the obligation, to allow transfer of technology outside of Israel. Also, even if we receive approval for the transfer of technology outside of Israel, such approval is likely to involve a significant payment to the OCS. We cannot be certain that any approval of the OCS will be obtained on terms that are acceptable to us, or at all.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	We also benefit from being designated as an &#8220;Approved Enterprise&#8221; and as Benefited Enterprise under Israel&#8217;s Law for the Encouragement of Capital Investments, 1959.&#160;&#160;For additional information, see the section below entitled "Additional Information - Law for the Encouragement of Capital Investments, 1959.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Additionally, we may be subject to varied regulation in the markets where we sell our products.&#160;&#160;The burden of complying with such regulatory schemes (which may be contradictory) could have a material adverse effect on our ability to diversify or grow our sales.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PGBRK" STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID="FTR">
<DIV ID="GLFTR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">

<EFX_OPERATING_AND_FINANCIAL_REVIEW>
<A NAME="FIS_OPERATING_AND_FINANCIAL_REVIEW"></A>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
<A NAME="ZK1618392_HTM_ITEM5">
	ITEM 5
</A>
	.
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	OPERATIN
</FONT>
<!--EFPLACEHOLDER-->
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	G AND FINANCIAL REVIEW AND PROSPECTS
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Management&#8217;s discussion and analysis of financial condition and results of operations
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	You should read the following discussion of our financial condition and results of operations in conjunction with our consolidated financial statements and the related notes and other financial information contained elsewhere in this annual report. This discussion contains forward-looking statements that involve risks and uncertainties, including those discussed in "Item&#160;3. Key Information&#8212;Risk Factors." See "Forward-looking statements" at the beginning of this annual report.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Overview
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<!--EFPLACEHOLDER-->
	We develop and market intelligent content capture and workflow automation solutions for managing and validating incoming content in any format from any source. Whether originating from electronic, paper, mobile or other sources, our solutions deliver digital content to the people and applications that drive an enterprise by using advanced network, mobile and cloud technologies.&#160;&#160;Our software improves business processes by integrating different types of data from multiple sources. Our products integrate information regardless of the source and format of the data, whether structured, as in the case of application forms or surveys, or semi-structured, such as invoices, purchase orders, checks, freight and shipping bills and others or unstructured. Our solutions seamlessly deliver the extracted data to downstream business applications for further processing, performance monitoring, archival and storage such as enterprise content management, enterprise resource planning, or customer relationship management systems. Our solutions minimize the need for manual data entry by automatically reading, identifying, interpreting and processing information, thereby increasing data capture accuracy and straight through processing. Our platform consolidates incoming documents and data from multiple sources for Omni channel processing, replacing traditional means of extracting information from paper-based documents and integrating multiple information sources one platform for optimal processing, monitoring and compliance.&#160;&#160;&#160;Going forward we are consolidating the capabilities of our eFLOW, mobiFLOW and eFLOW Cloud Docs platforms to create an enhanced multi-functional platform that will drive advanced end-to-end process automation solutions.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	In 2015, we had a net loss of $8.3 million compared to net loss of $5.5 million in 2014 which is primarily attributable to a decrease in our revenues, and an increase in cost of revenues.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Sales Cycle
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Our sales to end-user customers, value-added resellers, distributors and system integrators are made on open credit terms and we do not hold collateral to secure payment. The terms of the arrangements with these customers, generally, do not provide them with the right to return the purchased products or solutions.&#160;&#160;Payment with respect to such sales is generally due within a specified period following receipt of an invoice.&#160;&#160;The period varies from customer to customer, but usually we provide credit terms of up to 120 days for end-user customers and up to 180 days for resellers, distributors and system integrators.&#160;&#160;In some arrangements, management can offer longer payment terms as mentioned above, evaluating business sense, creditworthiness of the customer and other facts needed to establish such decision.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Our sales cycle for
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	eFLOW
</FONT>
	&#174; solutions ranges from 9 to 15 months. These sales cycles vary by customer and could extend for longer periods depending on the time required by the customer to evaluate the utility of the applicable product to its operations.&#160;&#160;Our operating results could vary between periods as a result of this fluctuation in the length of our sales cycles, the purchasing patterns of potential customers, the timing of introduction of new products and product enhancements introduced by us and our competitors, technological factors, variations in sales by distribution channels, competitive pricing and generally non-recurring product sales.&#160;&#160;Consequently, our license revenues may vary significantly by quarter.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PGBRK" STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID="FTR">
<DIV ID="GLFTR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PN" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; WIDTH: 100%">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	- 30 -
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">
<HR STYLE="COLOR: BLACK" NOSHADE SIZE="3">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage35"></A>
<DIV ID="HDR">
<DIV ID="GLHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Geographical Considerations
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The following table summarizes total revenues by geographic market for each of the last three completed fiscal years.
</FONT>
</DIV>
